sentence.Network_en: The World Health Organization launched an emergency campaign against leishmaniasis.

sentence.Network_en: From 1984 to 2005, a total of 836 leishmaniasis cases were reported.
sentence.Network_cn: 2005年全省共报告黑热病836例,每年均有发病.

sentence.Network_en: Dengue, filariasis, leishmaniasis , onchocerciasis, and American trypanosomiasis ( Chagas disease ) are other diseases carried by insects.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 利什曼病（leishmaniasis），又称黑热病（Kala-azar）。它的病原体是几种趋内脏的(viscerotropic )利什曼原虫(leishmania spp)。
